Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ServerController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ServerController
All Implemented Interfaces:
ObserverController, ObserverObject
public class ServerController
extends java.lang.Object
implements ObserverController
This is the main class for the controller of the game, it is the controller for the Distributed MVC pattern. It owns the game and other controllers and manage the all execution, it calls other controllers when specific actions must be controlled and eventually modifies the game if needed.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private Builder buildController  
    private DefeatManager defeatController  
    private Mover moveController  
    private Game observedModel  
    private SetupManager setupController  
    private VictoryManager victoryController  

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    ServerController​(Game g)
    Creates a ServerController with the game to control.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void generateOrder()
    Calls the generate order function.
    private boolean isBuildablePhase()
    Checks if the current phase is a phase where can be performed a build.
    private boolean isMovablePhase()
    Checks if the current phase is a phase where can be performed a move.
    void observerQuit​(ObservableRemoteView observed)
    This method is called when a player which is only observing the match wants to quit the game, it make it quit and changes the model, if the player isn't inside the game as observer an AssertionError is thrown because there has been an error on handling the observers.
    void updateBuild​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming buildMessage)
    This method is called when a client wants to perform a certain build, if the player cannot perform a build because the indicated one is forbidden or because it isn't its turn or it is the wrong phase, this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.
    void updateColors​(ObservableObject observed, NetColorPreparation playerColors)
    This method receives a request from a client through its RemoteView and analyze if it's the player's turn and if it is the correct phase (the color phase), if this conditions are all true then the method calls the SetupManager, otherwise it calls the error handling method of the RemoteView.
    void updateGods​(ObservableObject observed, NetDivinityChoice playerGods)
    This method receives a request from a client through its RemoteView and analyze if it's the player's turn and if it is the correct phase (the gods phase), if this conditions are all true then the method calls the SetupManager, otherwise it calls the error handling method of the RemoteView.
    void updateMove​(ObservableObject observed, NetGaming moveMessage)
    This function is called when a player can move and want to perform a certain move, if it can't move this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.
    void updatePositions​(ObservableObject observed, NetGameSetup netObject)
    This method receives a request from a client through its RemoteView and analyze if it's the player's turn and if it is the correct phase (the positioning workers on game map phase), if this conditions are all true then the method calls the SetupManager, otherwise it calls the error handling method of the RemoteView.
    void updateQuit​(ObservableObject observed, java.lang.String playerName)
    This method is called when a player wants to quit the game, it make it quit and changes the model, if the player isn't inside the game this method is going to call the error handling method of the RemoteView and stops.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • isMovablePhase

      private boolean isMovablePhase()
      Checks if the current phase is a phase where can be performed a move.
      Returns:
      true if a move can be performed, otherwise false

    • isBuildablePhase

      private boolean isBuildablePhase()
      Checks if the current phase is a phase where can be performed a build.
      Returns:
      true if a build can be performed, otherwise false

    • updateColors

      public void updateColors​(ObservableObject observed, NetColorPreparation playerColors)

      Specified by:
      updateColors in interface ObserverController
      Parameters:
      observed - is the ObserverObject which called this method
      playerColors - is the NetColorPreparation message sent from the player
